ABOUT US

GARDA SAFE provide the highest quality integrated security solutions through a dedicated, highly trained and professional team tailoring our service to the clients individual requirements. We want to make our clients feel safe through our security solutions locally, regionally and nationally

Our Vision

To make our clients feel safe through our security solutions locally, regionally, and nationally. To be recognized as the leading integrated safety solution provider, raising standards of safety, courtesy and efficiency to the benefit of our clients, staff and the community.

Our Mission

To provide the highest quality integrated security solutions through dedicated, highly-trained, partner-oriented security professionals tailoring our service to the client's individual requirements.
